spec_data.Name: akmods
spec_data.Description:
Akmods startup script will rebuild akmod packages during system
boot while its background daemon will build them for kernels right
after they were installed.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 06:42:25 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Automatic kmods build and install tool
